content.data:
[Y]Safe Habits
[W]Respect the kit and the room.
[c][m.]
[W]No drinks near machines, clean
[W]shutdowns and labelled disks reduce
[W]accidents.
[W]Shared responsibility routines also
[W]teach teamwork and care.
[c][m.]
[G]- Dry desks.
[G]- Label media.
[G]- Store hardware properly.
[m][m-]
[Y]CLASS RULE
[C]Carefulness is part of computing
[C]literacy.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
